title: Where can residents recycle or donate packing materials like styrofoam blocks, peanuts, air-filled plastic, bubble wrap, padded envelopes, etc. Please include Pender and Brunswick County locations.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/05/where-can-packing-materials-like-styrofoam-blocks-peanuts-air-filled-plastic-bubble-wrap-padded-envelopes-etc-be-recycled-or-donated/
